mods.abstract: Page 62 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [207] shows a bull exhibited in profile facing left. Stables shown in the background.; Photograph 2 [208] shows a cow exhibited in profile facing left with a chained tag looped around its horns. Three men and stables are shown in the background.; Photograph 3 [209] shows a black and white cow exhibited in profile facing left. A boy in a suit and flat cap stands presenting the cow. Stables shown in the background.
mods.note: All photographs probably taken at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
